alert.note: Alert for Adams (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 4:56PM CDT until June 15 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: The National Weather Service in La Crosse has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Adams County in central Wisconsin... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 456 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near New Rome, or 12 miles south of Wisconsin Rapids, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Adams County, including the following locations... The Leola Marsh Wildlife Area, Lake Arrowhead, Lake Sherwood, County Roads G And O, Lake Camelot, County Roads O And W and County Roads D And G. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for central Wisconsin. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
